exempt_addrs.reason: Founder allocation for bootstrap — auditable, vested and locked to prevent dumps

vesting.notes: After a 90-day cliff, founder tokens unlock linearly monthly for 12 months.

lock_conditions.description: Founder allocation remains non-transferable / non-mintable until public mints reach 20,000,000 UNQ.

mint_rules.exempt_reason: Founder fair share: 1M UNQ for bootstrap — disclosed, vested via evolve + lock

quantum.notes: Use Dilithium3 for evolve signatures; identity_pub is required for PQ verification

fees.note: Genesis UNQ: No deploy fees. For mints: protocol_fee_percent per_tx; + phased price to reserve minus 1% to protocol treasury.

meta.name: UNQ
meta.description: Genesis object of BRC-8888 — universal, AI-enabled, and PQ-ready. Fair launch: 10K UNQ cap per user, founder 1M exempted (auditable). Founder allocation is vested and locked until public distribution completes.
meta.tokenomics: 21M fixed. Founder mint: 1M vested & locked. Public sale follows phased fixed prices. Protocol fees are 1% per tx; revenue captured by reserve_address (BRC-8888 takes 1%).
